benchmark_details.name: OFFICE BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: OFFICE BENCH is one of the first office automation benchmarks for evaluating current LLM agentsâ€™ capability to address the office tasks in realistic office workflows.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capability of LLM agents in solving tasks across different applications in office automation.

data.source: Synthesized data simulating realistic office environments with fictitious names and data from ChatGPT and random generators.
data.annotation: Tasks are annotated based on complexity involving single, two, or three applications for realism.

methodology.calculation: Measured as the percentage of tasks passed by the LLM agents.
methodology.interpretation: Higher pass rates indicate better performance of LLM agents in office automation tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4 Omni achieves the highest pass rate of 47.00%.
methodology.validation: Tasks are validated through various customized evaluation methods.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Only synthesized data is used, with no real names or sensitive information.
